segments.text: Don't throw paper on the floor , Bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where shall I put it , miss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Put it in the waste-paper basket , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But Peter and Tony put all their paper in the basket a few moments ago.Now it's full .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , take the basket outside and empty it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where did you empty the basket , Bill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Silly boy ! The dustbin is at the back of the school . Now pick up the paperand put it in the dustbiri .
segments.speaker: S1
